scheme_name: Planning for Best Livestock Keeper's Award Function
nodal_department: Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department
brief_description: The "Planning for Best Livestock Keeper's Award Function" scheme by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department honors outstanding pastoralists in Gujarat by awarding them at Taluka, District, and State levels for their excellence in animal husbandry.
detailed_description: The &quot;Planning for Best Livestock Keeper&#39;s Award Function&quot; scheme introduced by the Agriculture, Farmers Welfare and Cooperation Department, Gujarat, aims to encourage and recognize the contributions of dedicated pastoralists across Gujarat. Awards are distributed at the Taluka, District, and State levels during designated programs. Award winners are not eligible to apply again for the next three years.
benefits: Taluka Level Awards (Total 496): First Prize: ₹20,000/- Second Prize: ₹10,000/- District Level Awards (Total 66): First Prize: ₹25,000/- Second Prize: ₹20,000/- State Level Awards (Total 3): First Prize: ₹1,00,000/- Second Prize: ₹51,000/- Third Prize: ₹31,000/- Note: Award is given once in three years only.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a farmer. The applicant must be a resident of Gujarat.

steps: Step 1: The applicant may visit and apply online at I-Khedut Portal: https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/  Step 2: On the home page, click on ‘Schemes' and then click on ‘Agricultural Schemes'. Step 3: Now select the scheme, click on the ‘Apply' button and an application page will open. Step 4: Click on "Apply New" button and submit a new application. Step 5: Click on the "Update Application" button to add corrections to the application. Step 6: Once the application is done, confirm it. Step 7: Take a print out of the confirmed application and submit it to the office of Integrated Cooperative Development Project (ICDP). Step 8: Applicant can also check their Application Status/View/Print/Upload Application details from the below link: https://ikhedut.gujarat.gov.in/public/frm_Applicant_Corner.aspx  Contact Us:  Click here .

documents_required: Aadhaar Card. Caste Certificate. Identity Card. Ration Card.
